name: Memory Maze (itch) (Arasti, ncrmncr)
description:
Memory Maze is an educational game in which you have to test yourself and your memory, as well as the skills of passing mazes. There will be no hints, only you, the map and the maze!

The game features three types of procedurally generated labyrinths:

  • Perfect Maze;
  • Sigma Maze;
  • Delta Maze.

Also game has two game modes: Classic and Arcade. In the first, you are free to choose the type and characteristics of the maze, and in the second you need to go through several mazes in a row without the right to make mistakes.

Your task in passing any maze is simple - you need to explore the map of the maze, and then pass it from memory in the allotted amount of time.

As you explore the labyrinths, you may come across one of 25 possible Stories, which will tell you an interesting fact or some kind of story about the labyrinths.

Good luck!
